product_name: White Sierra Warm and Fuzzy Jacket - Toddlers' - Special Buy
long_description: The White Sierra Warm and Fuzzy jacket is just what it sounds like. The soft high-loft 200-weight polyester fleece will keep your toddler cozy during cold-weather adventures. Two handwarmer pockets. Special buy.
